name: 中华三国志-丝路山水版
detailed_description:
Three Kingdoms of China is a free, open source historical strategy single-machine simulation game developed by domestic volunteers for 10 years. With powerful customized editing platform, numerous excellent MOD works have been produced, game maps can be freely produced, hundreds of city pools can be customized, and rich scripts and events can be customized (the above functions are the old edition of the Three Kingdoms of China, STEAM editors are being transplanted and perfected, please look forward to it). At present, the number of martial generals has exceeded 2,000, and each martial general has a series of romances and historical books and biographies. Special skill title. Realistic internal affairs system, semi-round and semi-real-time map battle, has a very high repeatability and playability.

Silk Road Landscape Map Edition is a MOD of Danqingshan Landscape Painting style born in the Chronicle of the Three Kingdoms of China in 2019. It takes six months to complete by the three Kingdoms'enthusiasts. The maps are based on the Silk Road Landscape Map of the Ming Dynasty (formerly Mongolian Landscape Map), topographic data and historical references. From the north to Xianbei Wusun Nanda Jiaozhi Zhuya County, 230 Chengchi Passes have been constructed, which are originally created The design and effect of the military model, the army interface has been fine-tuned, the beginning of interface inscriptions and background music is also written and played by fans voluntarily, so as to make the whole more in line with the style of traditional Chinese painting. The Landscape Edition of Zhisilu Road of the Three Kingdoms of China satisfies the desire of some players to play single-player historical strategy games in traditional Chinese paintings.

That is to say, players are welcome to join the open source family of the Three Kingdoms of China. Only by building maps and generals, they can create more historical strategy games of the Three Kingdoms of China, even the Song Dynasty and Ming Dynasty, on the free platform of the Three Kingdoms of China.

short_description: Silk Road Landscape Edition is a MOD of Danqingshan Landscape Painting style born in the Chronicle of the Three Kingdoms of China in 2019. It takes half a year to complete by the three Kingdoms'enthusiasts.

fullgame.name: 中华三国志 the Three Kingdoms of China

supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
